entry.title: FcoMGX/IPv4-input-for-Web-Development: Vanilla JS IPv4 input component with structured octet fields. Features paste handling, seamless form integration, error prevention, and get/set validations. Lightweight, modern-browser compatible, and degrades gracefully without JavaScript.
entry.content: Vanilla JS IPv4 input component with structured octet fields. Features paste handling, seamless form integration, error prevention, and get/set validations. Lightweight, modern-browser compatible, and degrades gracefully without JavaScript.

entry.title: smartlabsAT/react-resize-detector-context: A lightweight React context that leverages react-resize-detector to detect the current breakpoint based on an element's width. It provides utility functions and helper components to conditionally render content based on responsive breakpoints.
entry.content: A lightweight React context that leverages react-resize-detector to detect the current breakpoint based on an element's width. It provides utility functions and helper components to conditionally render content based on responsive breakpoints.

entry.title: alaa-eddine/PineTS: PineTS is a lightweight, open-source TypeScript framework that recreates key Pine Script™ features and syntax in JavaScript. It enables developers to write, port, and experiment with PineScript-like indicators outside of TradingView’s environment.
entry.content: PineTS is a lightweight, open-source TypeScript framework that recreates key Pine Script™ features and syntax in JavaScript. It enables developers to write, port, and experiment with PineScript-like indicators outside of TradingView’s environment.
